pad

This is a flag to disable the new parry control. A process that determines that the damage on the attacking side has been parried when it comes into contact with a character in the parry state on the defending side.

Field.DisplayName: Is the attack power bonus invalid when holding both hands?
Field.Description: Avoid using the 1.5x growth status adaptation with both hands

Field.DisplayName: Will it be disabled with limited invincibility (only in the air)?
Field.Description: If "Do you want to penetrate invincibility" is ◯, this setting will be ignored.
Damage level to the player. If it is "0 (default)", it is not used. The meaning of the range other than "0 (default)" is the same as "Damage level".

Field.DisplayName: Abnormal state attack power magnification correction
Field.Description: Magnification correction is performed for the abnormal state attack power of special effects.

Field.DisplayName: Special effects attack power multiplier correction (attack power points)
Field.Description: Magnification correction is performed for the special effect ~ ~ attack power [point].

Field.DisplayName: Special effect attack power multiplier correction (attack power multiplier)
Field.Description: Magnification is corrected for the special effect's attack power multiplier.

Field.DisplayName: Special effect attack power multiplier correction (final attack power multiplier)
Field.Description: Attack side of special effect: ~ ~ Performs magnification correction for damage multiplier.
Behavior identification value: Plays damage motion only at specific times
Attribute of throw damage of attack judgment. Corresponding special effects will be applied. It works only when the attack ATK_PATAM_THROWFLAG_TYPE is "2: Throw".

Field.DisplayName: Special effect status abnormality correction (attack power point)
Field.Description: Magnification correction is performed for the special effect "Whether to apply the abnormal state attack power magnification correction".
For overwriting the ID of the parameter that corrects the attack attribute
